adverbs.description: testingly (comparative more testingly, superlative most testingly)

entries.meaning: In a tentative and experimental manner.
examples: I have lived as a spoiled child and you have lived as an exposed child, and now those children are looking testingly at each other.

entries.meaning: In a challenging manner; so as to test the stamina, patience, etc.
examples: ...whether the exercises took place in recognized military training areas or in territory testingly unfamiliar to the troops.
